itemInfo.itemDesc:
Deep flavor of honey can be tasted with this honey wine.
- Unique effect: All Damage Reduction +2 for 75 min.
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30 min.

item.name: Cooking Honey
item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.name: Cooking Honey
item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.name: Essence of Liquor
item.desc:
It can be extracted from fermented grains or fruits.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Fruit Wine, Exotic Herbal Wine, etc.

item.name: Mineral Water
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vendor or Innkeeper.\n\n※ Using Mineral Water on a Garden will slightly increase the amount of available Water Deposit.

item.name: Sugar
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.desc:
A natural resource originally obtained through Gathering that has been Processed for use as a Cooking Ingredient.
- How to Obtain: It can be produced by shooting a Wooden Beehive with a Matchlock and then Grinding the acquired Beehive.

- Usage: Oatmeal, Tea With Fine Scent, etc.

item.desc:
It can be extracted from fermented grains or fruits.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

item.name: Purified Water
item.desc:
Can be obtained by refining the bottle of water.
- How to Obtain : Filter the bottle of water
※ Using this item on the garden will greatly increase the amount of water deposit.
It can cure sunstroke.
※ The cool-down time is 5 seconds.

item.name: Sugar
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
